noun.definition: The way in which a person or group lives.
noun.example: The benefits of a healthy lifestyle.

verb.definition: To market a product or service by associating it with a particular lifestyle.
verb.example: The brand is heavily lifestyled to appeal to young professionals.

verb.definition: To display or act out a particular lifestyle, especially for show (slang).
verb.example: He was lifestyling at the resort.
